ca.mcgill.ecse211.dpmProject

Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.dpmProject.Navigation

  • public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is used for navigating the robot to a specific point on the grid (coordinates in cm)
    Author:
    Team12

      Navigation()

      converts distance to angle the wheel needs to turn in deg

      This method returns the smallest angle needed to turn
      static void travelTo(double x, double y, Odometer odometer, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor)
      This method is used to drive the robot to the destination point which is marked as an absolute coordinate (X, Y) The method constantly calls the turnTo method to first adjust to the angle it needs to turn to before moving
      static void turnTo(double dAngle, double currentT, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor)
      This method returns the angle the robot needs to turn (the smallest angle) to the next point

    • Method Detail

      • travelTo

        public static void travelTo(double x,
                            double y,
                            Odometer odometer,
                            EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor,
                            EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor)
        This method is used to drive the robot to the destination point which is marked as an absolute coordinate (X, Y) The method constantly calls the turnTo method to first adjust to the angle it needs to turn to before moving
        Parameters:
        x - the absolute x-coordinate of the destination, an integer value in double format
        y - the absolute y-coordinate of the destination, an integer value in double format
        odometer - the odometer object created in the main class
        leftMotor - the left motor of the robot
        rightmotor - the right motor of the robot

      • turnTo

        public static void turnTo(double dAngle,
                          double currentT,
                          EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor,
                          EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor)
        This method returns the angle the robot needs to turn (the smallest angle) to the next point
        Parameters:
        dAngle - the angle to turn towards
        currentT - the current direction
        leftMotor - the left motor
        rightMotor - the right motor

      • getDAngle

        public static double getDAngle(double x1,
                               double y1,
                               double xc,
                               double yc)
        This method returns the smallest angle needed to turn
        Parameters:
        x1 - the x of way point
        y1 - the y of way point
        xc - the current x
        yc - the current y
        Returns:
        the angle to turn in degrees

      • convertDistance

        public static int convertDistance(double radius,
                                  double distance)
        converts distance to angle the wheel needs to turn in deg
        Parameters:
        radius - of the robot
        distance - of the robot
        Returns:
        deg to turn

      • convertAngle

        public static int convertAngle(double radius,
                               double width,
                               double angle)
        converts angle to the actual angle needs to turn
        Parameters:
        radius - radius of the robot
        width - radius of the car
        angle - to turn
        Returns:
        angle that need to turn in deg
